wikipedia_page.main: Derek Robinson (born 31 July 1931) is a British former sports shooter. He competed in the 50 metre rifle, three positions event at the 1960 Summer Olympics.

response: *Derek Robinson (trade unionist) (1927–2017), known as "Red Robbo," British trade union spokesman
*Derek Robinson (physicist) (1941–2002), fusion scientist and director of the Culham Science Center
